      • Chart

        public Chart​(int width,
             int height,
             boolean exportMean,
             boolean connectPoints)
        Parameters:
        width - - The width of the chart
        height - - The height of the chart
        exportMean - - Whether to export (trace a line) on the mean of the chartvalues
        connectPoints - - Whether to connect the points of the chart with a line
